post.body: maybay
got the video to work. really creative and nicely rendered. thanks again!
thanks for the shout-out! i can't watch the video because connection speeds are too slow here, but i appreciate it!
video chat with me live right now! on skype or AIM (screen name: hypostylin)
just published a revised edition of an article i wrote on economics and the american horror film (PDF): http://bit.ly/bDEf
in ouagadougou. hating it so far.
heading to ouagadougou for even more peace corps training.
it took four days, but i finally got all the pictures and videos from my mali trip uploaded: http://www.flickr.com/photos/hypostylin
i wonder how many people are unaware that they need the pngfix.js script (or similar) to display transparent pngs in internet explorer.
another 20km bike ride
new years in burkina: fireworks (both legit and unofficial), six 65cl local brews, one shot of rum, prostitutes as far as the eye can see.
just helped the most adorable, non-french-speaking german couple find their way around bobo. i feel so useful!
uploading a grip of pictures from mali. don't look at my flickr right now. disaster area.
back from an epic trip to mali. ridiculous photos and blog entries soon to come. DO IT BIG.
stopped by the police in the middle of nowhere because our bush taxi driver tried to avoid road tolls. IDIOT.
c'est le départ! getting up early for the trek to mali. hopefully we'll make it there unscathed.
making baked macaroni and cheese and getting crunk off of bissap (http://bit.ly/7U6U) spiked with cheap vodka (paint thinner, really).
joyeux noël. i love burkina, but christmas in africa has nothing on christmas in new england.
this is sad -- santa comes to burkina and gives presents to rich, white, european expatriates: http://bit.ly/bajU
sigh. today i've biked over 40km in 90-degree weather. a vacation is in order. greenland's nice and cool this time of year ...
